destinations.whyGo: Perfect for a weekend getaway to experience France's capital with iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, world-class museums, and elegant boulevards - easily accessible by high-speed train from Avignon.
Excellent day trip destination - France's oldest city with multicultural atmosphere, historic Vieux-Port, and easy access to the stunning Calanques National Park, just over an hour away by train.
Great for a day trip to experience France's gastronomic capital with UNESCO-listed Renaissance architecture and vibrant cultural scene, easily reachable by high-speed train.
Perfect weekend destination on the glamorous Côte d'Azur with the famous Promenade des Anglais, stunning Old Town, and beautiful Mediterranean beaches - just 2.5 hours by train.
Essential day trip from Avignon - this historic Roman city is famous for its well-preserved amphitheater, Roman theater, and connection to Vincent van Gogh, just 20 minutes away by train.
Perfect half-day trip from Avignon - this ancient Roman city has the best-preserved Roman amphitheater in the world and the Maison Carrée temple, just 30 minutes by train.
Excellent day trip destination - this elegant university city is known for beautiful architecture, vibrant café culture, fountains, and connection to Paul Cézanne, easily accessible by train or bus.
Quick day trip from Avignon - this historic Roman city is famous for its magnificent Roman theater, one of the best-preserved in the world, and the Triumphal Arch, just 15 minutes by train.
Charming Provençal town perfect for a half-day trip from Avignon - known for its historic center, weekly market, and proximity to the beautiful Luberon region, just 25 minutes by train.
Great day trip destination from Avignon - this historic town features impressive Roman ruins, medieval upper town, and beautiful Provençal architecture in the heart of wine country.
Perfect day trip from Avignon - one of France's most beautiful villages, perched on a hilltop with stunning views over the Luberon Valley and famous for its stone architecture.
Excellent day trip from Avignon - this picturesque village in the Luberon is famous for its ochre-colored cliffs and buildings, offering stunning natural landscapes and Provençal charm.
Great half-day trip from Avignon - this dramatic hilltop village features medieval castle ruins, stunning views over the Alpilles mountains, and the famous Carrières de Lumières.
Perfect day trip from Avignon - this charming Provençal town is where Van Gogh spent time in the asylum, known for beautiful architecture, markets, and proximity to Roman ruins.
Essential wine destination near Avignon - this famous wine village is known for prestigious red wines, historic castle ruins, and beautiful vineyards in the heart of the Rhône Valley.
Great wine village excursion from Avignon - renowned for powerful red wines and stunning mountain scenery in the Dentelles de Montmirail, perfect for wine enthusiasts.
Exciting international destination from Avignon - the vibrant Catalan capital famous for Gaudí's architecture, excellent cuisine, beautiful beaches, and rich cultural heritage.
Fascinating international trip from Avignon - Italy's fashion and design capital with stunning Gothic cathedral, world-class shopping, and gateway to the Italian Lakes and Alps.
Beautiful international destination from Avignon - this city on Lake Geneva offers stunning Alpine views, excellent museums, and serves as gateway to both the Swiss and French Alps.
Interesting international trip from Avignon - the European Union capital with stunning Grand Place, excellent beer culture, Art Nouveau architecture, and world-class museums.
Epic international journey from Avignon - experience this world-class city with iconic landmarks, royal palaces, excellent museums, diverse neighborhoods, and rich history.
Charming international destination from Avignon - this canal city is known for artistic heritage, beautiful architecture, world-class museums, and vibrant cultural scene.
Fascinating international trip from Avignon - this major financial center features impressive skyline, excellent museums, historic old town, and serves as gateway to the Rhine Valley.
Beautiful international destination from Avignon - Switzerland's largest city offers stunning lake setting, excellent museums, shopping, and serves as gateway to the Swiss Alps.
